forum.name: T5D1 Discussion: Solutions for Goal-setting
forum.intro:
Discussion: Responses to Integrating Goal-Setting into Instructional Practice and The Adult Learner Toolkit

Based on the readings and your own experiences, please post your responses to the following questions:

  • What are some of the challenges of working with students to determine and meet their goals?  What are some solutions that may address these challenges?
  • Which activity did you select from the Adult Learner Goals Toolkit to try with your learners? [Briefly describe the activity for your peers.]
  • Why did you choose this activity?  What do you hope to learn from using it? How might it support instruction?

After you post, please take time to review others posted responses and post at least one reply in response.

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on an Intro-Assessment-ABE link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Course Outline and access the next course activity.
